decimal-input-symbol.name: x
decimal-input-symbol.description: The x position of the player

decimal-input-symbol.name: y
decimal-input-symbol.description: The y position of the player

enumerated-input-symbol.name: current_behavior
enumerated-input-symbol.description: Behavior currently activated by the user

constant.name: forward_speed
constant.description: Speed in which the robot will normally go forward

constant.name: turning_speed
constant.description: Speed in which the robot will normally turn

constant.name: reverse_speed
constant.description: Speed in which the robot will normally reverse. Because Xabsl doesn't allow negative constants it's positive, and everything that uses it, should negate it.

decimal-input-symbol.name: laser_min_wnw
decimal-input-symbol.description: Laser sensor information for west-north-west region

decimal-input-symbol.name: laser_min_nw
decimal-input-symbol.description: Laser sensor information for north-west region

decimal-input-symbol.name: laser_min_nnw
decimal-input-symbol.description: Laser sensor information for north-north-west region

decimal-input-symbol.name: laser_min_n
decimal-input-symbol.description: Laser sensor information for north region

decimal-input-symbol.name: laser_min_nne
decimal-input-symbol.description: Laser sensor information for north-north-east region

decimal-input-symbol.name: laser_min_ne
decimal-input-symbol.description: Laser sensor information for north-east region

decimal-input-symbol.name: laser_min_ene
decimal-input-symbol.description: Laser sensor information for east-north-east region
